description:
Blab is the brand new live streaming platform that is taking the social media world by storm!

People who use Blab are hooked and, according to Shaan Puri, Blab's CEO, the average Blab user spends 64 minutes on Blab, per session!

It is this level of excitement and interactivity that gives you a winning edge in business.

In this course, you will discover what Blab is, how Blab works and how to use Blab to market ANY business.

On Blab, since you are the host of your own online talk show, you can use a variety of show formats to promote your business.

This course will walk you through 7 show formats and what the pros and cons are of each format for different businesses.

In Part One of this course, you will learn the basics of Blab.

In Part Two of this course, you will learn about the 7 Blab show formats that you can use to market your business.

When you begin using these Blab show formats, you will see interactivity and engagement increase as your credibility, authority and reach increases exponentially!

You also get 3 bonus Blab show ideas that you can use as well as brainstorming activities to determine the best Blab show formats to use for your business.

If you're excited about Blab as a user, wait until you see how you can turn Blab into your very own interactive marketing machine!

Your enrollment is backed by Udemy's 30-day, money-back guarantee, so be sure to check out the free preview lectures below and enroll today!
title: Blab - 7 Top Blab Show Formats For More Sales
